text: David Denman (born July 25, 1973) is an American actor. He is known for his role as Roy Anderson, the ex-fianc√© of Pam Beesly on the NBC sitcom The Office, for which he earned a SAG award as a member of the ensemble cast. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from California
